resources.string: "I have an account already Go to log in page"

string.name: info_text
string.p: This is the key for prevent any other student who are not engaged your class anymore. so you should give this code to the student who are actually in your classroom. this key help them to enter the virtual class

string.name: info_text_student
string.p: This is the key for prevent unwanted users sign up. so you should give student security key.If you dont have please collect from Admin

string.name: info_text_teacher
string.p: This is the key for prevent unwanted users sign up. so you should give teacher security key.If you dont have please collect from Admin

resources.string: By default correct point 1 and no decrease on wrong answer. if you change click more
For every Question point increase (++) on Correct Option showing given below. And decrease (â€”) on Wrong option showing given bellow
